page.title: 20A Family Weekend in June
page.content: back to the house and changed into my swimsuit. I put on lots of suntan oil and lay on a cover outside. It was very hot, but I stayed out until 5:20, when Pauline came home. The phone rang. It was the manager of the pub. He asked Pauline to bring some ice as the ice-machine was broke. My older sister Marie drove up 10 min- utes later. We were surprised as she should have been in France! That night we watched TV and Pauline went out with her boyfriend. I went to bed at 12:15. I woke up at 8:45, went to Chapel, came home and had lunch. I got changed and played outside until dinnertime. We went to The Manzil (an Indian restaurant) for our dinner. I then stayed at my cousin's for a while then went home. I watched TV until 9:35 and eventually went to bed at 10:25.
